title: DRAFT JSON Schema for the theme-configurations.json file

Version.description: The version of this file, which helps the reader detect the format (or error if incompatible).

Debug.description: Global debug settings to enable/allow debug for admins or normal users.

Allowed.description: Global toggle to allow/prevent debug to appear at all. If this is false, nothing else will happen. Turn this off for production.

Admin.description:
Enable/disable debug buttons everywhere for admins. 
 This global setting can still be overriden at each part.

Anonymous.description:
Enable/disable debug buttons everywhere for anonymous users so you can see debug in the anonymous-user state. 
 This global setting can still be overriden at each part.

ThemeDesigns.title: All the configurations for the design of a theme
ThemeDesigns.description: Contains various configuration bundles for how the theme can be designed (mainly CSS classes)

Languages.title: All the configurations for languages
Languages.description: Contains various configuration bundles for what languages to show.
